wikipedia_page.main: Roger Ernest Hoy (6 December 1946 – 9 November 2018) was an English professional footballer. Playing primarily as a defender, he made a total of 112 appearances in the Football League for Tottenham Hotspur, Crystal Palace, Luton Town and Cardiff City before moving into non-league football with Dagenham.

response: * 9 November 2018: Roger Hoy, 71, Tottenham Hotspur, Crystal Palace, Luton Town and Cardiff City defender.
